whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.description: SkillBridge is a space where knowledge is brought together. Here, experts can share their expertise, and those who want to learn can find a mentor or course that suits them. The platform is designed for convenient and transparent cooperation: no fees for classes, only direct communication between the teacher and the student. Affordable education is actually closer than it seems.
